import React, {useEffect} from 'react' import {Link} from "react-router-dom" import {useState} from "react" import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { StartTwoTone } from '@mui/icons-material' function Provider({info}) { const dispatch = useDispatch() const [location, setLocation] = useState(null); const [zipCode, setZipCode] = useState(""); const [name, setName] = useState(""); const [address, setAddress] = useState(""); const [phone, setPhone] = useState(""); const [city, setCity] = useState(""); const [state, setState] = useState(""); const [isProviderValid, setIsProviderValid] = useState(false); info.Name = name info.Address = address info.Phone = phone info.ZipCode = zipCode info.City = city console.log(info) useEffect(() => { }, [zipCode, name, address, phone]) return ( <>

Name setName(e.target.value)} />
Address setAddress(e.target.value)}/> setCity(e.target.value)}/> setState(e.target.value)}/>
Phone setPhone(e.target.value)} />
Zipcode setZipCode(e.target.value)} className="w-36 text-sm p-2 mt-1 border-2 h-8 border-gray-400 " />
) } export default Provider
